segments.source_content: import RemoveGlobalCLI from './\_remove-global-cli.md';

translations.zh-hant: @@untranslatable_placeholder_a9b642df

segments.source_content: Installing dependencies

translations.zh-hant: Installing dependencies

segments.source_content: You will need Node, the React Native command line interface, a JDK, and Android Studio.

translations.zh-hant: 您需要安裝 Node、React Native 命令行工具、JDK 和 Android Studio。

segments.source_content: While you can use any editor of your choice to develop your app, you will need to install Android Studio in order to set up the necessary tooling to build your React Native app for Android.

translations.zh-hant: 雖然您可以使用任何編輯器開發應用程式，但必須安裝 Android Studio 才能設置必要的工具來為 Android 構建 React Native 應用程式。

segments.source_content: Node, JDK

translations.zh-hant: Node, JDK

segments.source_content: We recommend installing Node via [Chocolatey](https://chocolatey.org), a popular package manager for Windows.

translations.zh-hant: 我們建議透過 [Chocolatey](https://chocolatey.org)（Windows 上流行的套件管理工具）安裝 Node。

segments.source_content: It is recommended to use an LTS version of Node. If you want to be able to switch between different versions, you might want to install Node via [nvm-windows](https://github.com/coreybutler/nvm-windows), a Node version manager for Windows.

translations.zh-hant: 建議使用 Node 的 LTS 版本。若需切換不同版本，可透過 [nvm-windows](https://github.com/coreybutler/nvm-windows)（Windows 的 Node 版本管理工具）安裝 Node。

segments.source_content: React Native also requires [Java SE Development Kit (JDK)](https://openjdk.java.net/projects/jdk/11/), which can be installed using Chocolatey as well.

translations.zh-hant: React Native 還需要 [Java SE Development Kit (JDK)](https://openjdk.java.net/projects/jdk/11/)，同樣可透過 Chocolatey 安裝。

segments.source_content: Open an Administrator Command Prompt (right click Command Prompt and select "Run as Administrator"), then run the following command:

translations.zh-hant: 以管理員身分開啟命令提示字元（右鍵點擊命令提示字元並選擇「以系統管理員身分執行」），然後執行以下命令：

segments.source_content:
```powershell
choco install -y nodejs-lts microsoft-openjdk11
```

translations.zh-hant: @@untranslatable_placeholder_940e34e3

segments.source_content: If you have already installed Node on your system, make sure it is Node 14 or newer. If you already have a JDK on your system, we recommend JDK11. You may encounter problems using higher JDK versions.

translations.zh-hant: 若系統已安裝 Node，請確認版本為 14 或更新。若已安裝 JDK，建議使用 JDK11。使用更高版本 JDK 可能會遇到問題。

segments.source_content: > You can find additional installation options on [Node's Downloads page](https://nodejs.org/en/download/).

translations.zh-hant: > 更多安裝選項請參閱 [Node 下載頁面](https://nodejs.org/en/download/)。

segments.source_content: > If you're using the latest version of Java Development Kit, you'll need to change the Gradle version of your project so it can recognize the JDK. You can do that by going to `{project root folder}\android\gradle\wrapper\gradle-wrapper.properties` and changing the `distributionUrl` value to upgrade the Gradle version. You can check out [here the latest releases of Gradle](https://gradle.org/releases/).

translations.zh-hant: > 若使用最新版 Java Development Kit，需變更專案的 Gradle 版本以識別 JDK。方法是前往 `{project root folder}\android\gradle\wrapper\gradle-wrapper.properties` 並修改 `distributionUrl` 值來升級 Gradle 版本。[此處可查閱 Gradle 最新版本](https://gradle.org/releases/)。

segments.source_content: Android development environment

translations.zh-hant: Android development environment

segments.source_content: Setting up your development environment can be somewhat tedious if you're new to Android development. If you're already familiar with Android development, there are a few things you may need to configure. In either case, please make sure to carefully follow the next few steps.

translations.zh-hant: 若您是 Android 開發新手，設置開發環境可能較為繁瑣。即使已有經驗，仍需配置部分設定。無論如何，請仔細遵循後續步驟。

segments.source_content: 1. Install Android Studio

translations.zh-hant: 1. Install Android Studio

segments.source_content: [Download and install Android Studio](https://developer.android.com/studio/index.html). While on Android Studio installation wizard, make sure the boxes next to all of the following items are checked:

translations.zh-hant: [下載並安裝 Android Studio](https://developer.android.com/studio/index.html)。在安裝精靈中，請確保勾選以下所有項目：

segments.source_content:
- `Android SDK`
- `Android SDK Platform`
- `Android Virtual Device`
- If you are not already using Hyper-V: `Performance (Intel ® HAXM)` ([See here for AMD or Hyper-V](https://android-developers.googleblog.com/2018/07/android-emulator-amd-processor-hyper-v.html))

translations.zh-hant:
- `Android SDK`
- `Android SDK Platform`
- `Android Virtual Device`
- 若未使用 Hyper-V：`Performance (Intel ® HAXM)`（[AMD 或 Hyper-V 用戶請參閱此處](https://android-developers.googleblog.com/2018/07/android-emulator-amd-processor-hyper-v.html)）

segments.source_content: Then, click "Next" to install all of these components.

translations.zh-hant: 接著點擊「Next」安裝所有元件。

segments.source_content: > If the checkboxes are grayed out, you will have a chance to install these components later on.

translations.zh-hant: > 若選項呈灰色不可勾選，後續仍可安裝這些元件。

segments.source_content: Once setup has finalized and you're presented with the Welcome screen, proceed to the next step.

translations.zh-hant: 安裝完成並顯示歡迎畫面後，請繼續下一步。

segments.source_content: 2. Install the Android SDK

translations.zh-hant: 2. Install the Android SDK

segments.source_content: Android Studio installs the latest Android SDK by default. Building a React Native app with native code, however, requires the `Android 13 (Tiramisu)` SDK in particular. Additional Android SDKs can be installed through the SDK Manager in Android Studio.

translations.zh-hant: Android Studio 預設會安裝最新版 Android SDK。但使用原生代碼構建 React Native 應用程式需要特定的 `Android 13 (Tiramisu)` SDK。可透過 Android Studio 的 SDK 管理器安裝其他 Android SDK。

segments.source_content: To do that, open Android Studio, click on "More Actions" button and select "SDK Manager".

translations.zh-hant: 開啟 Android Studio，點擊「More Actions」按鈕並選擇「SDK Manager」。

segments.source_content: ![Android Studio Welcome](/docs/assets/GettingStartedAndroidStudioWelcomeWindows.png)

translations.zh-hant: ![Android Studio 歡迎畫面](/docs/assets/GettingStartedAndroidStudioWelcomeWindows.png)

segments.source_content: > The SDK Manager can also be found within the Android Studio "Settings" dialog, under **Languages & Frameworks** → **Android SDK**.

translations.zh-hant: > SDK 管理器也可在 Android Studio 的「Settings」對話框中找到，路徑為 **Languages & Frameworks** → **Android SDK**。

segments.source_content: Select the "SDK Platforms" tab from within the SDK Manager, then check the box next to "Show Package Details" in the bottom right corner. Look for and expand the `Android 13 (Tiramisu)` entry, then make sure the following items are checked:

translations.zh-hant: 在 SDK 管理器中選擇「SDK Platforms」標籤頁，然後勾選右下角的「Show Package Details」。找到並展開 `Android 13 (Tiramisu)` 項目，確保以下項目已被勾選：

segments.source_content:
- `Android SDK Platform 33`
- `Intel x86 Atom_64 System Image` or `Google APIs Intel x86 Atom System Image`

translations.zh-hant:
- `Android SDK Platform 33`
- `Intel x86 Atom_64 System Image` 或 `Google APIs Intel x86 Atom System Image`

segments.source_content: Next, select the "SDK Tools" tab and check the box next to "Show Package Details" here as well. Look for and expand the `Android SDK Build-Tools` entry, then make sure that `33.0.0` is selected.

translations.zh-hant: 接著選擇「SDK Tools」標籤頁，同樣勾選「Show Package Details」。找到並展開 `Android SDK Build-Tools` 項目，確保選中 `33.0.0` 版本。

segments.source_content: Finally, click "Apply" to download and install the Android SDK and related build tools.

translations.zh-hant: 最後點擊「Apply」以下載並安裝 Android SDK 及相關建置工具。

segments.source_content: 3. Configure the ANDROID_HOME environment variable

translations.zh-hant: 3. Configure the ANDROID_HOME environment variable

segments.source_content: The React Native tools require some environment variables to be set up in order to build apps with native code.

translations.zh-hant: React Native 工具需要設置某些環境變數才能建置包含原生代碼的應用程式。

segments.source_content:
1. Open the **Windows Control Panel.**
2. Click on **User Accounts,** then click **User Accounts** again
3. Click on **Change my environment variables**
4. Click on **New...** to create a new `ANDROID_HOME` user variable that points to the path to your Android SDK:

translations.zh-hant:
1. Open the **Windows Control Panel.**
2. Click on **User Accounts,** then click **User Accounts** again
3. Click on **Change my environment variables**
4. Click on **New...** to create a new `ANDROID_HOME` user variable that points to the path to your Android SDK:

segments.source_content: ![ANDROID_HOME Environment Variable](/docs/assets/GettingStartedAndroidEnvironmentVariableANDROID_HOME.png)

translations.zh-hant: ![ANDROID_HOME 環境變數](/docs/assets/GettingStartedAndroidEnvironmentVariableANDROID_HOME.png)

segments.source_content: The SDK is installed, by default, at the following location:

translations.zh-hant: SDK 預設安裝在以下位置：

segments.source_content:
```powershell
%LOCALAPPDATA%\Android\Sdk
```

translations.zh-hant: @@untranslatable_placeholder_7b2110d8

segments.source_content: You can find the actual location of the SDK in the Android Studio "Settings" dialog, under **Languages & Frameworks** → **Android SDK**.

translations.zh-hant: 您可以在 Android Studio 的「Settings」對話框中找到 SDK 的實際位置，路徑為 **Languages & Frameworks** → **Android SDK**。

segments.source_content: Open a new Command Prompt window to ensure the new environment variable is loaded before proceeding to the next step.

translations.zh-hant: 開啟新的命令提示字元視窗以確保新環境變數已載入，再繼續下一步。

segments.source_content:
1. Open powershell
2. Copy and paste **Get-ChildItem -Path Env:\\** into powershell
3. Verify `ANDROID_HOME` has been added

translations.zh-hant:
1. 開啟 powershell
2. 複製並貼上 **Get-ChildItem -Path Env:\\** 到 powershell
3. 確認 `ANDROID_HOME` 已添加

segments.source_content: 4. Add platform-tools to Path

translations.zh-hant: 4. Add platform-tools to Path

segments.source_content:
1. Open the **Windows Control Panel.**
2. Click on **User Accounts,** then click **User Accounts** again
3. Click on **Change my environment variables**
4. Select the **Path** variable.
5. Click **Edit.**
6. Click **New** and add the path to platform-tools to the list.

translations.zh-hant:
1. Open the **Windows Control Panel.**
2. Click on **User Accounts,** then click **User Accounts** again
3. Click on **Change my environment variables**
4. Select the **Path** variable.
5. Click **Edit.**
6. Click **New** and add the path to platform-tools to the list.

segments.source_content: The default location for this folder is:

translations.zh-hant: 此資料夾的預設位置為：

segments.source_content:
```powershell
%LOCALAPPDATA%\Android\Sdk\platform-tools
```

translations.zh-hant: @@untranslatable_placeholder_cae897fb

segments.source_content: React Native Command Line Interface

translations.zh-hant: React Native Command Line Interface

segments.source_content: React Native has a built-in command line interface. Rather than install and manage a specific version of the CLI globally, we recommend you access the current version at runtime using `npx`, which ships with Node.js. With `npx react-native <command>`, the current stable version of the CLI will be downloaded and executed at the time the command is run.

translations.zh-hant: React Native 內建命令列介面。與其全域安裝並管理特定版本的 CLI，我們建議您使用 Node.js 自帶的 `npx` 在運行時存取當前版本。透過 `npx react-native <command>` 執行命令時，將自動下載並運行當前穩定版的 CLI。

segments.source_content: Creating a new application

translations.zh-hant: Creating a new application

segments.source_content: <RemoveGlobalCLI />

translations.zh-hant: @@untranslatable_placeholder_65095059

segments.source_content: React Native has a built-in command line interface, which you can use to generate a new project. You can access it without installing anything globally using `npx`, which ships with Node.js. Let's create a new React Native project called "AwesomeProject":

translations.zh-hant: React Native 內建命令列介面可用於生成新專案。您無需全域安裝任何套件，直接使用 Node.js 自帶的 `npx` 即可存取。讓我們創建一個名為「AwesomeProject」的新 React Native 專案：

segments.source_content:
```shell
npx react-native@latest init AwesomeProject
```

translations.zh-hant: @@untranslatable_placeholder_342e4d80

segments.source_content: This is not necessary if you are integrating React Native into an existing application, or if you've installed [Expo](https://docs.expo.dev/bare/installing-expo-modules/) in your project, or if you're adding Android support to an existing React Native project (see [Integration with Existing Apps](integration-with-existing-apps.md)). You can also use a third-party CLI to init your React Native app, such as [Ignite CLI](https://github.com/infinitered/ignite).

translations.zh-hant: 若您要將 React Native 整合至現有應用程式、專案中已安裝 [Expo](https://docs.expo.dev/bare/installing-expo-modules/)，或是為現有 React Native 專案添加 Android 支援（參見 [與現有應用程式整合](integration-with-existing-apps.md)），則無需此步驟。您也可以使用第三方 CLI（如 [Ignite CLI](https://github.com/infinitered/ignite)）來初始化 React Native 應用程式。

segments.source_content: [Optional] Using a specific version or template

translations.zh-hant: [Optional] Using a specific version or template

segments.source_content: If you want to start a new project with a specific React Native version, you can use the `--version` argument:

translations.zh-hant: 若想使用特定 React Native 版本創建新專案，可透過 `--version` 參數指定：

segments.source_content:
```shell
npx react-native@X.XX.X init AwesomeProject --version X.XX.X
```

translations.zh-hant: @@untranslatable_placeholder_4e583d18

segments.source_content: You can also start a project with a custom React Native template with the `--template` argument.

translations.zh-hant: 你也可以使用 `--template` 參數來以自訂的 React Native 模板啟動專案。

segments.source_content: Preparing the Android device

translations.zh-hant: Preparing the Android device

segments.source_content: You will need an Android device to run your React Native Android app. This can be either a physical Android device, or more commonly, you can use an Android Virtual Device which allows you to emulate an Android device on your computer.

translations.zh-hant: 你需要一個 Android 裝置來運行你的 React Native Android 應用程式。這可以是實體的 Android 裝置，或者更常見的是使用 Android 虛擬裝置（AVD），它允許你在電腦上模擬 Android 裝置。

segments.source_content: Either way, you will need to prepare the device to run Android apps for development.

translations.zh-hant: 無論哪種方式，你都需要準備裝置以運行開發用的 Android 應用程式。

segments.source_content: Using a physical device

translations.zh-hant: Using a physical device

segments.source_content: If you have a physical Android device, you can use it for development in place of an AVD by plugging it in to your computer using a USB cable and following the instructions [here](running-on-device.md).

translations.zh-hant: 如果你有實體的 Android 裝置，你可以透過 USB 線將其連接到電腦，並按照[這裡](running-on-device.md)的指示來代替 AVD 進行開發。

segments.source_content: Using a virtual device

translations.zh-hant: Using a virtual device

segments.source_content: If you use Android Studio to open `./AwesomeProject/android`, you can see the list of available Android Virtual Devices (AVDs) by opening the "AVD Manager" from within Android Studio. Look for an icon that looks like this:

translations.zh-hant: 如果你使用 Android Studio 打開 `./AwesomeProject/android`，你可以透過 Android Studio 內的「AVD Manager」查看可用的 Android 虛擬裝置（AVDs）列表。尋找一個看起來像這樣的圖標：
@@untranslatable_placeholder_a66415bc

segments.source_content: If you have recently installed Android Studio, you will likely need to [create a new AVD](https://developer.android.com/studio/run/managing-avds.html). Select "Create Virtual Device...", then pick any Phone from the list and click "Next", then select the **Tiramisu** API Level 33 image.

translations.zh-hant: 如果你最近安裝了 Android Studio，你可能需要[創建一個新的 AVD](https://developer.android.com/studio/run/managing-avds.html)。選擇「Create Virtual Device...」，然後從列表中選擇任何一款手機並點擊「Next」，接著選擇 **Tiramisu** API Level 33 的映像檔。

segments.source_content: > If you don't have HAXM installed, click on "Install HAXM" or follow [these instructions](https://github.com/intel/haxm/wiki/Installation-Instructions-on-Windows) to set it up, then go back to the AVD Manager.

translations.zh-hant: > 如果你沒有安裝 HAXM，點擊「Install HAXM」或按照[這些指示](https://github.com/intel/haxm/wiki/Installation-Instructions-on-Windows)來設置，然後回到 AVD Manager。

segments.source_content: Click "Next" then "Finish" to create your AVD. At this point you should be able to click on the green triangle button next to your AVD to launch it, then proceed to the next step.

translations.zh-hant: 點擊「Next」然後「Finish」來創建你的 AVD。此時，你應該可以點擊 AVD 旁邊的綠色三角形按鈕來啟動它，然後繼續下一步。

segments.source_content: Running your React Native application

translations.zh-hant: Running your React Native application

segments.source_content: Step 1: Start Metro

translations.zh-hant: Step 1: Start Metro

segments.source_content: First, you will need to start Metro, the JavaScript bundler that ships with React Native. Metro "takes in an entry file and various options, and returns a single JavaScript file that includes all your code and its dependencies."—[Metro Docs](https://metrobundler.dev/docs/concepts)

translations.zh-hant: 首先，你需要啟動 Metro，這是 React Native 內建的 JavaScript 打包工具。Metro「接收一個入口檔案和各種選項，並返回一個包含所有代碼及其依賴項的單一 JavaScript 檔案。」—[Metro 文檔](https://metrobundler.dev/docs/concepts)

segments.source_content: To start Metro, run `npx react-native start` inside your React Native project folder:

translations.zh-hant: 要啟動 Metro，請在你的 React Native 專案資料夾內運行 `npx react-native start`：

segments.source_content:
```shell
npx react-native start
```

translations.zh-hant: @@untranslatable_placeholder_0029045f

segments.source_content: `react-native start` starts Metro Bundler.

translations.zh-hant: `react-native start` 會啟動 Metro Bundler。

segments.source_content: > If you use the Yarn package manager, you can use `yarn` instead of `npx` when running React Native commands inside an existing project.

translations.zh-hant: > 如果你使用 Yarn 套件管理器，你可以在現有專案中運行 React Native 命令時使用 `yarn` 代替 `npx`。

segments.source_content: > If you're familiar with web development, Metro is a lot like webpack—for React Native apps. Unlike Kotlin or Java, JavaScript isn't compiled—and neither is React Native. Bundling isn't the same as compiling, but it can help improve startup performance and translate some platform-specific JavaScript into more widely supported JavaScript.

translations.zh-hant: > 如果你熟悉網頁開發，Metro 很像 webpack——但用於 React Native 應用程式。與 Kotlin 或 Java 不同，JavaScript 不是編譯的——React Native 也不是。打包（bundling）與編譯不同，但它可以幫助提高啟動性能，並將一些平台特定的 JavaScript 轉換為更廣泛支持的 JavaScript。

segments.source_content: Step 2: Start your application

translations.zh-hant: Step 2: Start your application

segments.source_content: Let Metro Bundler run in its own terminal. Open a new terminal inside your React Native project folder. Run the following:

translations.zh-hant: 讓 Metro Bundler 在自己的終端中運行。在你的 React Native 專案資料夾內打開一個新的終端，然後運行以下命令：

segments.source_content:
```shell
npx react-native run-android
```

translations.zh-hant: @@untranslatable_placeholder_31b98214

segments.source_content: If everything is set up correctly, you should see your new app running in your Android emulator shortly.

translations.zh-hant: 如果一切設置正確，你應該很快就能在你的 Android 模擬器中看到新運行的應用程式。

segments.source_content: ![AwesomeProject on Android](/docs/assets/GettingStartedAndroidSuccessWindows.png)

translations.zh-hant: ![AwesomeProject on Android](/docs/assets/GettingStartedAndroidSuccessWindows.png)

segments.source_content: `npx react-native run-android` is one way to run your app - you can also run it directly from within Android Studio.

translations.zh-hant: `npx react-native run-android` 是運行應用程式的一種方式——你也可以直接從 Android Studio 中運行它。

segments.source_content: > If you can't get this to work, see the [Troubleshooting](troubleshooting.md) page.

translations.zh-hant: > 如果無法運行，請參閱[疑難排解](troubleshooting.md)頁面。

segments.source_content: Modifying your app

translations.zh-hant: Modifying your app

segments.source_content: Now that you have successfully run the app, let's modify it.

translations.zh-hant: 現在您已成功運行應用程式，接下來讓我們進行修改。

segments.source_content:
- Open `App.tsx` in your text editor of choice and edit some lines.
- Press the `R` key twice or select `Reload` from the Developer Menu (`Ctrl + M`) to see your changes!

translations.zh-hant:
- Open `App.tsx` in your text editor of choice and edit some lines.
- Press the `R` key twice or select `Reload` from the Developer Menu (`Ctrl + M`) to see your changes!

segments.source_content: That's it!

translations.zh-hant: That's it!

segments.source_content: Congratulations! You've successfully run and modified your first React Native app.

translations.zh-hant: 恭喜！您已成功運行並修改了第一個 React Native 應用程式。
@@untranslatable_placeholder_bf49b721

segments.source_content: Now what?

translations.zh-hant: Now what?

segments.source_content: - If you want to add this new React Native code to an existing application, check out the [Integration guide](integration-with-existing-apps.md).

translations.zh-hant: - 如果想將這段新的 React Native 程式碼加入現有應用程式，請參閱 [整合指南](integration-with-existing-apps.md)。

segments.source_content: If you're curious to learn more about React Native, check out the [Introduction to React Native](getting-started).

translations.zh-hant: 若想進一步了解 React Native，請查看 [React Native 簡介](getting-started)。
